revision.text:
__NOTOC__ fixed '''GetLineUDMFFixed''' (int ''lineid'', string ''key'')
== Usage ==
Retrieves a value for a custom user key set for a line.
=== Parameters === *''lineid'' :The [[tag]] of the line. A value of '''0''' uses the activating line. *''key'' :The name given to the user key.
=== Return value === The [[fixed point]] value that was set for this user key.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[category:ACS Information functions]]
